titles: Quakerism a-la-mode, or, A history of quietism particularly that of the Lord Arch-bishop of Cambray and Madam Guyone ... also an account of the management of that controversie (now depending at Rome) betwixt the Arch-bishop's book / writ by Messire Jacques Benignes Bossuel [sic] ... ; done into English from the original printed at Paris.
author: Bossuet, Jacques Bénigne, 1627-1704.
publisher: Printed for J. Harris ..., and A. Bell...,
notes: Reproduction of original in St. John's College Library, Cambridge University.
keywords: Guyon, Jeanne Marie Bouvier de La Motte, 1648-1717.
Fénelon, François de Salignac de La Mothe-, 1651-1715.
